GP_INFORMATION_PRIVACYPOLICY:
This policy describes the information we process to support Unlimited Play and improve our user experience on the Unlimited Play platform.
To improve our products and users’ experience, we must process information about you including the following:
- Device information: device attributes, device operations, identifiers, device signals, data from device setting, network and connections, and cookie data
- Activities of users on the platform: subscription history, purchase history & redemption history
- User information: name, date of birth, gender, payment method, and location
All data collected will be used to provide improve the platform and build engagement with the users.
GP_INFORMATION_ABOUTUS: Unlimited Play is a product trademark under Cellcard. Unlimited Play aims to become a single destination for Cambodia gamers to purchase unlimited data, gaming devices, game currency & items, as well as esport tournaments.
GP_INFORMATION_TERMSANDCONDITIONS:
Unlimited Play plan is available for all Cellcard’s Prepaid users
 To enjoy using data offer on Unlimited Play plan, you are required to have an active status, but your Play Coins does not require active status when redeeming items in store.
 Fair usage data policy applies to ensure everyone receive best gaming experience.
 Unlimited data for PUBGM, MLBB, and RoS cover all gameplay inside the app. However, some functions/features that come from external sources are not covered. We have included extra data in the offers to make sure you have the best experience.
 Unlimited Play plan is an auto renewal plan. Once your plan is expired, please top-up your main balance or purchase the plan with your digital payment method.
 Play Coins are valid for 3 months after you make purchase or earn.
 Play Coins cannot be exchange to cash or transfer with other users.
 Play Coins can be used to redeem game currency & other items on Unlimited Play portal only.
 All games currency and items purchased on the platform cannot be refund.
 Cellcard reserve the right to change or update terms and conditions without prior notice.
GP_INFORMATION_FAQONE: Is Unlimited Play portal available for Cellcard users only?
GP_INFORMATION_ANSONE: Unlimited Play portal is available for everyone in Cambodia. <a href='/#login'>Sign in here. <a/>
GP_INFORMATION_ANSTWO: Unlimited Play plan is a subscription base plan which offers unlimited data for playing PUBGM, MLBB, and RoS, extra data for Facebook, and generic data for normal internet surfing. Subscribers will get extra benefits such as  <a href='/me/playpoints'>Play Coins<a/>, and exclusive offers from Unlimited <a href='/store/exclusive-offers'>Play Partners<a/>. <a href='/#plans'>Check out our plan here<a/>
GP_INFORMATION_ANSTHREE: Play Coins is the credit balance of Unlimited Play portal. You can use Play Coins to buy game currency and items. As well as redeem exclusive deal.  <a href='/me/playpoints'>Buy Play Point now!<a/>
GP_INFORMATION_FAQFOUR: Who can subscribe to Unlimited Play offers?
GP_INFORMATION_ANSFOUR: All Cellcard prepaid users can subscribe to Unlimited Play plan. Sign up here.<a href='/#login'>Sign up here.<a/>
GP_INFORMATION_FAQFIVE: Can I subscribe to the same Unlimited Play plan at the same time?
GP_INFORMATION_ANSFIVE: No, you cannot subscribe to the same plan at the same time, but you can upgrade your current plan to a higher plan. Upgrade your plan here. <a href='/#plans'>Upgrade your plan here<a/>
GP_INFORMATION_FAQSIX: What happens to my plan benefits when I upgrade my plan?
GP_INFORMATION_ANSSIX:
Once you upgrade your plan, you can still enjoy using your existing and new plan as below:
BenefitsWhat Happens
Unlimited Data for PUBGM, MLBB, & RoSReplace with new plan
Data for FacebookRemaining bundle will be added up to new bundle
Extra DataRemaining bundle will be added up to new bundle
Play Coins Remaining Play Coins will be added up to new plan and expire based its own validity.
Validity
  • Remaining validity will continue until the current plan expires.
  • The user will have individual validity for the plans they subscribed to
GP_INFORMATION_FAQSEVEN: I bought Unlimited Offer, but I didn’t get offers as expected. What should I do?
GP_INFORMATION_ANSSEVEN: If you face this issue, please call get support here.
GP_INFORMATION_FAQEIGHT: Can I send Unlimited Play plan as a gift to my friends?
GP_INFORMATION_ANSEIGHT: Yes, you can send Unlimited Play plan as a gift or an upgrade to your friends as long as s/he is a prepaid Cellcard users. And it does not require you to be a Cellcard user. Send a gift your friend now. <a href='/#plans'>your friend now.<a/>Note: There is a fail chance when you send Unlimited Play plan as a gift or an upgrade because your friend could have zero or negative balance.
GP_INFORMATION_FAQNINE: Can I buy Play Coins for my friends as a gift?
GP_INFORMATION_ANSNINE: Yes. You can buy Play Coins for you friends.<a href='/me/playpoints'>Buy now?<a/>
